attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Homework, I understand, can help with learning, but this lowers the time children need to be a child.
There have been experiences myself with homework and school taking all my day up.
We encourage a healty lifestyle with excerise; but how is this possible with children being tied down with homework.
A little homework is fine, but when 6 or 7 are all set at the same time, come on!
By removing homework, the approximately 5-6 hours can be used with children's social life, healthy lifestyle and other equally important things.
I ask you: please think of the children!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
